abstrac: developing products with passion and market insight
bio:
product development specialist specialized in personal care, home care, car care and cosmetic. 

I have 15 years hands-on experience in assisting my clients to develop some of the very sellable products in the market. 

I have experience deal with China, Japan, USA, Europe, Australia and South East Asia market and well understood regional regulations. 

I can produce prototype of small volume and be able to assist to scale up to commercial scale production. I have existing network in raw material supplies as well as network of OEM producer to assist you to commercialize your products.

work term:

for stock formula (formula which i had developed for quick launching, you can adjust with different active ingredients and scents), charge is USD 200 per SKU.

for project basis: my charge is USD 900 per SKU (new product development)

for contractual consultation service: my charge is USD 12000 per annum, all product development during contractual period is nominal fee at USD 200 per project, with unlimited consultation time. I can assist on scale-up, raw materials sourcing and product management (in South East Asia region). 

lead time for project delivery is 2-8 weeks depends on complexity and raw material availability. 

payment to be made via guru platform only.

abstrac: Expert Development team having expertise in Android, IOS, C#, WPF MVVM,ASP.net MVC6, Web API, PHP Codeignitor, MSSQL, Mysql, Angular js, Flutter, Kotlin, BlockChain, Power Apps,Crypto dev
bio:
Airo Global Software is many years of experienced software development company providing professional IT solutions to global clients.
The processes we follow are matching the best in the industry and ensure maximum quality and efficiency. We do  web, software, and mobile app development  with out the well-experienced team  

See our services video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aVrrTUkxdjQ

We offer a wide range of web/software development solutions using the latest technologies such as Socket io, Node.js,  PHP,  WordPress, and frameworks such as ASP.NET MVC,   Zend, CodeIgniter, Laravel, HTML,CSS, Bootstrap,Angular, C#, ASP.net, MVC Core, WPF c#

 We also do BlockChain, CryptoCurrency,

We are experts in developing mobile applications for iPhone, Android, IPAD, and Tablets  , Watch App using Swift, Objective-C, Android Java and Kotlin, Flutter Dart, Power Apps

We also have a well-versed networking team and manage our own data center to fulfill any server solutions and cloud management easily 

We have worked on over 5,000+ projects and extend end-to-end IT-enabled solutions and services to a broad spectrum of industry verticals ranging from Automobiles, Health and Fitness, Pharmacy and Medicines, Real Estate, News, Information and Technology, Law, Travel and Hospitality, Finance, Music, Computers and Hardware, Business and Services, Crypto Currency and blockchain, Food delivery, Ticket booking, Ecommerce and delivery, Asset Management, Automation.

Payments Only by Guru.com Safepay Escrow No Upfront Payment
100% Escrow to be deposited at the start of the project 
and milestones will be placed as per discussions and requirements 

We offer very fair prices and flexible terms for a win-win situation.

Communication Methods:
• Email
• Instant Messages (Skype, Hangouts)
• Phone

Deliveries: We make weekly releases to our clients and keep them updated about the current state of the project persistently. We have regular conference calls and weekly status report submissions. Daily status reporting is our basic and mandatory practice

Our advantages
==============
* Consistently in top Companies in guru.com
* Executed around 4500+ Apps covering iOS, Android and Windows and 2000+ websites
* 75+ Employees,  Project Managers from different locations
* Availability of PM in EST and PST to ensure seamless Project Management at no extra cost
* 100% Free technical support for 120 days from the date of implementation
* Everything is done by in house team in our Offices In India
* Abide by Confidentiality, Non-Disclosure and Non-Compete agreements with Customers protecting customers Intellectual Property
* All developers are Graduates or Post Graduates in Computer Science and IT 
* All professionals are well skilled in English in terms of Speaking, Writing and listening 
* Always available on Skype and Google Hangouts. 
* Direct interaction with Developers and Project Managers
